message.content:
<<<api>>>: Apache-POI Library
<<<code>>>: private long poiGetCellValue(XSSFCell cell){
    long x;
    if(cell.getCellType() == 0)
        x = (long)cell.getNumericCellValue();
    else if(cell.getCellType() == 1)
        x = Long.parseLong(cell.getStringCellValue());
    else
        x = -1;
    return x;
}
<<<explanation>>>: The error you're getting is because the cell you're trying to get the value from is of a different type than what you're expecting. You can use the getCellType() method to check the type of the cell and then handle it accordingly. In this code, if the cell type is numeric (0), it will get the numeric value, and if the cell type is string (1), it will parse the string value to a long. If the cell type is neither numeric nor string, it will return -1.
